summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 PONTIAC G6. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE RADIATOR RESERVOIR WAS LEAKING ANTI-FREEZE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE NEW LIQUID WAS ORANGE IN COLOR. WHEN THE FLUID LEAKED UNDERNEATH THE VEHICLE, THE LIQUID WAS STILL ORANGE. THE VEHICLE WAS INOPERABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 140,000.
